buildings.title: custom
buildings.description: Parameters for all or individual buildings.

custom.description: List of individual buildings and their custom parameters.

connectors.description: Parameters related to the connections between objects.

cost_function.description: Cost function to use in topology optimization

optimization_approach.description: Approach to use for topology optimization

time_period.description: Time horizon for topology optimization.This paramater is used only if LCC is used as the cost function.

discount_rate.description: Discount rate for topology optimization. This paramater is used only if LCC is used as the cost function.

convergence_criteria.description: Convergence criteria used to indicate to the optimization algorithm when to stop. This could represent a number of iterations.

cost_function_definition.title: defaults
cost_function_definition.description: Possible cost functions for the topology optimization problem

optimization_definition.title: defaults
optimization_definition.description: Optimization approach for the topology optimization problem

building_def.description: The default system parameters for all of the buildings. These can be overwritten on a building by building basis by setting values in objects in the array with the geojson_id defined.

geojson_id.description: The GeoJSON ID as defined in the GeoJSON file. This is used to overwrite the default data for a specific building. This option is not used in the default section.

ets.title: ets
ets.description: energy transfer station model, one side is connected with district water loops, and the other side is connected with building water loops

system.description: Indirect cooling ETS. The energy transfer is implemented through nondirect contact of water loops.

description.description: User defined description. Not used in the translation process.

load_model.description: Type of load model to use for the building.

connector_def.description: Parameters associated with the connectors in a district system.

district_system_def.description: Parameters associated with the district system.

return_configuration.description: Type of return configuration for the overall district system. MW - not really needed. Just use pipes with supply/return.

idf_filename.description: Absolute path or relative path from location where file instance is saved.

epw_filename.description: Absolute path or relative path from location where file instance is saved.

mos_weather_filename.description: Absolute path or relative path from location where file instance is saved.

fraction_latent_person.description: Fraction latent of sensible persons load (e.g., 0.8 = home, 1.25 = office)

time_series_model_parameters.description: Parameters associated with time series models.
